title: Next Gen Starts Next Week - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.30.20
description:
Greg and Blessing talk about Xbox's scheduled Series X game reveal event, Assassin's Creed Valhalla, and more! 
 
Time Stamps - 
 00:03:45 - Housekeeping
The Final TLOU Stream today? 2 pm PT
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Al Tribesman, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:05:11 - Xbox Series X Games Are Coming
00:21:10 - Assassin's Creed Valhalla Deets
00:32:20 - Do you think this is the first of many third party games where Playstation gamers will seemingly need to buy a new copy of the game for ps5 if the buy it first on PS4? - Best Friends Q: Parker Petrov
00:29:42 - Thoughts on Rap Battles - Best Friends Q: Charles Jakobsen
00:45:50 - No Nintendo Direct in June, Jeff Grubb @ VentureBeat
00:52:47 - Xbox Game Pass Hits 10 million subs, Jacob Kas-tren-akes @ The Verge
00:56:00 - Has Gamepass been a success - Best Friends Q:Parker Petrov
01:01:40 -  OLD SPICE
01:03:10 - Out today
01:06:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Tim
